ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: ... look at the possibility ... are currently overpowered ... improvements while some other ... I don t want any new power for my bard, I just a few things
ygData.messageBody:
>
> Why bother trying to discuss class balance if you're not going to even
look at the possibility
> that bards are overpowered already? And if you won't accept that if bards
are currently overpowered
> compared to other classes as a whole that they won't get major
improvements while some other
> classes will, then I predict you are about to be even more disappointed.

I don't want any new power for my bard, I just a few things fixed.
Snare was one.

Now how about the stop, start, stop spell bug which has managed to survive
for 2 years. (This happens to all casters, bards just notice it the most
since we cast spells a lot more than any other casters).

How about making it so I don't sucessfully charm a mob, yet have no control
over him and am unable to recharm or attack the mob till charm breaks.

And (and this will NEVER happen) some way to take the strain of twisting off
my poor fingers.

Elfson Allegro 51 Veeshan

PS. I forgot to add make saying, "Just play mana song" a violation of the
PNP
